projects.headline: MY CRAFT
projects.title: Projects
projects.text: In my projects, I focus on creating user-friendly and responsive solutions that are both functional and visually appealing. Each project is built on efficient and clean code to optimize performance and ensure a seamless user experience. Take a look at some of my work and see for yourself the quality and creativity I bring to every project.
projects.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.game: An action-packed jump, run, slash, and throw game with an object-oriented approach
projects.pokedex: An interactive Pokédex web app that fetches Pokémon data via an API, allowing users to search and explore Pokémon details easily.
